DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct United States America ( USA ) . The purpose study test whether biphasic insulin aspart 70/30 safe least effective alternative combination two oral anti-diabetics compare two oral anti-diabetics alone control blood glucose .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Biphasic Insulin Aspart 70/30 With Anti-Diabetic Drugs Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec , insulin aspart drug combination
